title: "Logiq driving forward as a global provider of e-commerce and fintech business enablement solutions"
excerpt: "Logiq Inc. is a US-based leading global provider of e-commerce and fintech business enablement solutions. Its DataLogiq business provides a data-driven, end-to-end e-commerce marketing solution. Its AI-powered LogiqX data engine delivers valuable consumer insights that enhance the ROI of online marketing spend."
